A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a horrible movie\, this captures none of the charm of any of the originals\, it even fails to capture what JJ had managed with the nostalgia of TFA.\n\nCarrie Poppins is literally the worst thing I've seen on screen\, ever.
